name: All-Star Baseball 2005
description:
All-Star Baseball 2005 is a sports game developed by Acclaim Studios Austin. It came out on 23-03-2004. Acclaim Entertainment published the game.
You can play All-Star Baseball 2005 on PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
Jools Watsham directed the game. Jools Watsham, Nelson Everhart and Rick Fox scored the game.
